prontera.gat,192,191,4        script        副主城傳送員        757,{
mes "[副主城傳送員]";
mes "你要回去了嗎？";
next;
menu
"是",Ltrans,
"否",Lcon;
Ltrans:        
		savepoint "amatsu",115,154;
warp "amatsu.gat",115,154;        end;
Lcon:
mes "[副主城傳送員]";
mes "有需要在來。";
close;
}

amatsu.gat	mapflag	noskill	dummy
